subject: Soccer
Knees
lead_paragraph: The American forward Clint Dempsey faces a long layoff after injuring his knee during Fulham’s 2-0 loss at Blackburn in a Premier League game, the latest blow to American preparations for the World Cup.
snippet: The American forward Clint Dempsey faces a long layoff after injuring his knee during Fulham’s 2-0 loss at Blackburn in a Premier League game, the latest blow to American preparations for the World Cup.
